description: This file defines a React functional component named Modal, which renders a modal dialog box with configurable title, content, footer, and close functionality. It is used as a UI component within a larger React application.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a modal dialog with optional header, footer, and content. It displays only when 'open' is true and executes 'onClose' callback on close button click.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer }) {$/
